attributes.action: We would like to kindly request the government to stop article 13 of the EU laws
attributes.additional_details: This article needs an action as many teenagers will not be able to have fun. The CEO statement may be found on https://www.digitaltveurope.com/2018/11/26/youtube-urges-content-creators-to-speak-out-against-article-13/ .
attributes.background: This petition is about article 13 of the European laws is required to be saved as teenagers will not be able to enjoy making videos on social platforms such as Youtube.com. The CEO of the social platform of YouTube states: "creator economy is under threat".
